description:
Kiri succumbs to Crime Edge`s power and goes berserk, dealing a major blow to Emily. Iwai finds Emily terrified in the woods and decides to help her. As the two of them make their way through the trees, Kiri confronts them. Iwai shields Emily from the still-crazed Kiri. He rushes Iwai, but loses consciousness upon severing her hair.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: グレイランド・イズインザハウス
